place_description: Community Coffee Shop & Bar in Madison Park, Charlotte serving espresso, coffee, tea, ice cream, cocktails, & more!

reviews_data.review_text: Is this place closed for good or just temporarily?

I may be biased as this is my local coffee shop, but we really love this place. The owners are great, the baristas are great, the coffee is great.  They do live music and programs for kids.  What's not to like?
Family owned, local coffee, just what every neighborhood needs!
Stephan was amazing
Love the coffee, LOVE the Queen City Tea, and really appreciate Stephen. Great drinks and great customer service. 5 stars, 10/10, highly recommend

This is a pretty awesome coffee bar. Lots of different seating. Low tables, high tables, a large bar area. Some seats outside, too. Power outlets all around. Free wifi. Low quiet music. Lots of options for coffee, cold brew, baked goods, sandwiches and such.

It was a little loud when we arrived but the party of mommies with their toddlers moved on after a few minutes.

My cortado was perfect except for the paper cup. Clearly, Peter's taught them how to do it. Two shots of espresso and an equal amount of steamed (not foamed) milk. Usually served in a short glass but not many places have them so it's a short cup. It was delicious and within 20 minutes, I could feel the caffeine hit me. I'm ready for the day, now!

This is a busy shopping center and a few cars zipped past the coffee shop. Keep an eye out for that traffic as you back out of your parking space!
Natalie was so kind and helped me pick out a very delicious decaf tea before open mic! Thank you Natalie! : )
Natalie was incredible! Extremely helpful, radiant and sweet. Loved coming here. Amazing coffee shop in Lower South End!
Delicious iced latte, excellent service from Natalie, and a comfy area to sit and wait while car is being repaired. Thank you!!
Natalie is amazing! She very much understood the assignment of cold coffee with lots of chocolate. Deeply appreciate it!

The coffee was way overpriced especially for the quality. I was surprised they charged to add flavor to an already expensive latte and alternative milks increase the price by a dollar.The service was fine and the drink came out quickly. Overall the best part of the coffee shop was the atmosphere. Lots of comfortable seating and they play good music. Will not be returning for coffee but may try their food next due to the nice interior.
Perfect spot for getting work done! Cozy atmosphere, delicious coffee, and the Wi-Fi is lightning fast. Highly recommend!
Great atmosphere and Morgan was nice
Love this coffee shop. Good drinks, good food and good vibes.
The PB Banana Wrap was a unique option and so good. I will definitely be ordering that again. My iced latte with oatmilk was solid as well. Service was fast. Pretty cool spot as well.
Loved every second of being here!

Madison Perks has incredible energy. From the incredible coffee to the vibrant event space, MP is the premier southend coffee destination. The barista Stephen knows his pours and makes incredible drinks. Stop by for an afternoon sip on your way to work or cowork with your besties for an evening of productive vibes.

The lavender latte has sparkles which I desperately needed on a Monday. The menu was extremely limited due to issues with suppliers, which was disappointing but the option suggested was tasty. Would return for sure!

Steven (or Stephen) was my barista and served my wife and I excellent Mochas (her iced and myself hot). The hot coffee wasn't burn your mouth hot and both tasted fantastic. They were setting up for live music when we visited and even though we couldn't stay to listen it looked great. Very clean and a very chill spot to hang out should you need to.
Love getting coffee here. Their seasonal drinks are always great especially the lavender vanilla Spring Fling. Natalie is an awesome barista.
Cozy and open coffee shop with super friendly staff. They have a small stage for performances and the whole space just feels very open.

Great latte with perfect amount of foam. The sugar free vanilla tasted natural, unlike others I've had. Natalie was extremely friendly and even checked on the correct spelling of my name, that never happens. Good overall experience.
Batista was really sweet but the WiFi didn't work so I had to leave :(
first time here & stephen helped us out and made the most delicious drinks!!!!
Stephen was wonderful!!!! True asset!
Stephen is the man! Love this place and great coffee!!
One of the best lattes I've found in the US so far. Espresso show was great. Just be sure to ask for half milk, unless you like the standard American milky latte style.

Michael was amazing to encounter with!
My coffee was the best!!!
Morgan was a great barista! I loved her recommendation of the iced Spring Fling. It was great drink, and I appreciate her quick service despite the many customers.
Drinks were okay. I got breakfast burritos, and it was smaller compared to other places. $$$ to Quanity ratio is off.
Haille was wonderfully quick and pleasant
Love this place Steven was great as Batista. Music from Doug, Rick and Kim was the best.

The barista Morgan was incredibly friendly and personable as I waiting to receive my drink and we had such an amazing conversation good luck to their creative ambitions in life. The drink, service, atmosphere, live music, was fantastic and I definitely will be back again

This was such a great vibe! I needed a change of scenery to focus on a project, and what the perfect choice! The coffee was made with love. I got a oatmilk latte with caramel and vanilla and it was so smooth. I paired this with the bacon, egg and cheese wrap for the perfect breakfast, and didn't regret a thing! Even better, there was live music this morning!

I love coming here. The food is pretty good and they make really great coffee as well as drink drinks. The vibes are perfect for hanging out, working, or catching up with a friend. They also have live music at times and do lots of little specials and events. This is my favorite hidden gem coffee shop in Charlotte. I'm a diehard fan of Madison Perk.
Great egg and cheese wrap, great cold beer and even better vibes. Loved visiting on a cozy rainy morning!! Also picked up some espresso beans as a birthday present!
Great place with live band on weekends.
Very consistent baristas. Very nice environment and ambience. Steven does a great job. The owners are very passionate and involved.

My first time coming to Madison Perk. Great place to have a Dirty Chai made phenomenally by James. He also presented my drink with a artistic foam design...you can't get that at Starbucks. Thanks James for the outstanding drink and service. See ya soon!

Madison Perk Coffee Bar exceeded all expectations! From the moment I stepped in, I was greeted with warmth and hospitality. The ambiance was   cozy and inviting, perfect for catching up with friends. Their coffee selection is top-notch, with each sip bursting with flavor and quality. The barista, Natalie, was friendly and knowledgeable . It's clear that they take pride in their craft. Overall, a stellar experience that earns a well-deserved five stars!
The service and atmosphere was great
Nice coffee spot to chill, grab a quick bite or listen to live music.

Extremely friendly workers and who I assume to be owners?

Great coffee, great prices, great set up!
The loaded wrap was delicious  also the iced mocha was amazing!!!! Will definitely be back:) Beautiful atmosphere with a wonderful barista

Stopped by just to checkout this place. Didn't have time to purchase any drinks but barista was very nice and friendly! I grabbed a few slices of banana chocolate chip bread to go. Plan on returning soon to try the McIrish coffeegreat location with plenty parking, relaxing ambiance.
Such great coffee!! Haley was the barista and was so friendly and welcoming. I absolutely loved the coffee too! Delicious!
Came for a pop up class the Christmas hot chocolate was incredible!

While looking for a dinner location on evening, we just happened upon this coffee shop. The next morning we stopped in for some. MP is now a place we frequent whenever we're in the area. My Husband introduced himself to the owner, who was friendly and invited. Also, the coffee is great! I've had a different latte each visit.

I enjoyed my experience overall! The place has a great vibe. They had an area for somebody to perform live music. I would most definitely come back for that. I ordered a coffee with Bailey's and an Italian panini sandwich. The coffee was good. I usually like my coffee sweet so I wish there was an option for sugar or any sweetener. The sandwich was great! It was a little over toasted but It did not take away from the taste of the sandwich just added a little crunch. Yumm!
Cute little coffee shop. Excellent cortado- strong but smooth. Best part was the kids toys and books to keep my daughter entertained.
Very nice inside, super friendly barista (didn't catch his name). Loved my Gingerbread Dirty Chai, and girlfriend loved her Peppermint Mocha. Whenever I'm in the area, this will be my go-to!

Stopped here this morning on a whim and had a fabulous experience. Haley and Hang are rockstar employees. Friendly, attentive, and helpful. Gingerbread chai with espresso added tasted like a hug in cup- it was better than Starbucks and they do latte art on top of your hot drink! Happy Holidays and thank you!!
I love this little coffee shop. It's convenient and friendly. I wish they were open a little later for after work meetings.
The place was great! Coffee and food were indeed up, service was lovely. Its in an area I don't go to often but great to know it's there just in case for the future!
Live music was nice!
Very comfortable atmosphere and quick service!
This has been my go to place for over a year. The atmosphere is lovely. The most amazing chai latte I've ever had. The owners and staff are kind, interactive and always smiling.

The best little neighborhood coffee shop in Charlotte! Every time I go in, the baristas are warm and welcoming. The coffee is delicious and they can make it how you want it. And if I go in the evening for live music or for open mic night, they have a great selection of beer.
Slow service and very bitter coffee luke warm at best. Save yourself the headach and go somewhere else.
Nice place. Great deals on cocktails on Fridays. Really enjoy their seasonal drink offerings.
The espresso and the cold brew are good (not the best though). I would recommend getting porcelain cups. Paper cups change the taste of coffee.
Couldn't connect to the WiFi. Ordered a wrap and opened it up and it was soggy. Threw it away. Was not impressed and will not return!
Great tasting coffee and breakfast sandwich (pre-made)

We love this place! Besides going here with my family every Saturday morning, I threw a baby shower here on Thursday evening. The owners were so helpful during the planning process and then again day of. They had plenty of space for my guests and experienced staff to help work the event. I will definitely be using this venue again as a hosting location!

I got a chocolate muffin and mocha latte. The muffin tasted very weird and dry. I am guessing it was very old and not freshly made. Now my stomach is feeling funny after taking a bite of the muffin. I hope the owners looks into my feedback and starts to improve the food quality.
very cute spot! would love to come back for cocktails, foods & their various events
Great environment and great people behind the company. Always stopping by when in the area and glad I did.
Great coffee, great music and amazing service! Patrick is one of the nicest people I've ever met! They have a nice little stage with amazing sound and their open mic is my favorite in Charlotte.
Great coffee shop with great owners! Love all of the programming they offer on top of delicious beverages and bites.

Awesome choice for coffee. Our server was knowledgeable and made great recommendations. My hubs and I were very surprised to see you can have alcohol here. All I can say is we'll be back to telework or just funday Sunday by the big beautiful windows.
$$: prices compare to your neighborhood Starbucks but was way more delicious.
Love love this hidden gem!
Awesome place. Outstanding Coffee and espresso martinis
Clean and friendly environment. Tasty vanilla latte and cold brew.
Very chill atmosphere, Staff was welcoming I tried the pina colada latte which was surprisingly good.

Madison Perk has great coffee and good vibes. A good coffee house, should be be that, a feeling of a second home. A place that is comforting and inviting, Madison Perk hits this out of the park. I would highly recommend coming here vrs. any of the big chain places.
Very cute little coffee bar with excellent chill vibes! I had the lavender lemonade and it was such a lovely treat.
I really like the ambience here. will definitely be back for more coffee and work from here. Clean, friendly staff and offer food even vega options
Nice

I don't know what they think about their customers by serving cheapest quality of coffee and bakery items by charging $20 bucks for two coffee and a banana bread. It is like disrespecting their customers!
This place is awesome !!

I have tried SO many coffee shops all over the country and Madison Perk is my absolute favorite! I'm so lucky it's just five minutes from me. All of the drinks are amazing and I love that they're open later than most coffee shops. It's so nice to go somewhere where they know your name - the environment is warm and welcoming. I highly recommend it for early morning meetings, an afternoon pick-me-up, or evening relaxing with a drink or two. My happy place!

Huge fan of Madison Perk. They are a fantastic addition to the neighborhood and the owners are super nice people. We will definitely make it a frequent coffee spot. Plus they've got some really cool events at night that we will 100% be hitting up

Once of the best coffee bars ever!
Everything on the menu is good and the baristas are always helpful and friendly.
Great healthy snacks and craft beer too
Fantastic dirty chai!

I've been coming here since this gem opened last March, and walk up to get a latte once a week or so with my husband and now 16-month old son... the espresso is on pointe, and the service is super friendly and awesome!  There is even a space for little ones to play, with a bin of toys and some books.  Great neighborhood spot!  Highly recommend!
Best coffee on this side of town. Hands down
Hands-down, that was the best Chai Latte I ever had! Such a happy satisfaction  The ambience was lovely on a rainy Saturday  Perhaps I should plan to attend their evening music next time!
I'm always in search of local coffee spots ... this was a GREAT find!!  Atmosphere.. fantastic.

We LOVE Madison Perk! Drinks are so good and they have great food options too! Walking there with my family has become one of my favorite weekend activities. There are books and toys to keep kids occupied while we relax. Awesome family atmosphere on the weekend, great place to read or bring a laptop as well.
Coffee is great. Place is a little lite on seating. The cooler making a racket the entire time I was there was a real turn off. Worked a while and left with a headache.

Went here twice, espresso was meh, second time got dirty chai, really not great. They don't have glasses for people dining in. Just seems weird.

The food is awful. My reheated frozen breakfast burrito is dry and 3 days from sell by date according to sticker. And practically burned my mouth. Reminiscent of hot pockets or frozen burritos you can make at home for $2 vs the $9 charge here.

Couldn't get my self to eat it, had to toss it out..

Madison Perk hosted a private event for me on behalf of PORCH Charlotte, and every detail was handled professionally and graciously.  Their space was the perfect size for our intimate celebration party, and the staff was friendly and attentive.  The owner Stacy went out of her way to create custom touches with our logo and we felt welcome and appreciated.  I highly recommend Madison Perk for any private event needs, and love their coffee!
Latte was on the too sweet side but still good
Great addition to the neighborhood. I love everything about the place from the coffee to the music and the food!
We love Madison Perk! Great coffee shop and atmosphere. Such a fun coffee shop to walk to and enjoy on the weekends as well
Neighborhood spot, locally owned by awesome people. Great breakfast, coffee on point and they have cocktails and beer!

Coffee beans lacked flavour. Very bland.
My latte had far too many bubbles.
Great place to bring kids - alot of parent groups.

Is life a simulation? Is coffee your stimulation? If Madison Perk Coffee Bar were to be built in the metaverse...the digital domain design tab it would live under would be "Modern Style Cafe". Click Drag, Drop and Twirl to make it fit into your virtual world.

The ceilings were high and industrial but painted black so it had a disappearing effect. The floor was vast and of the shined epoxy concrete family line. The blend of wood and earth toned accoutrements were accented by poppin patterned furniture. Fridges hummed noticeably in the distance and contained those little add-on products that your mouth wants but your pockets don't always need. Oh so tempting. The menu was clear and in perfect view above your brain for making a masterful selection from lattes, drips and eats. It was clear....The handbook on how to create a "Cool Cafe" had been read.

I settled on a drip coffee and before I could say "I drink it strong" I realized this this was their motto posted around the shop. #drinkitstrong . I added the peanut butter banana wrap thingy and sat to sip my Joe while I waited for the food to materialize. The coffee was really mouth friendly and strong but not overly so with a smooth calm finish..like my lady. The wrap arrived hot off the TurboChef and it didn't look like much but tasted pretty good overall. I would've loved the incorporation of some sort of berry or jam dip and perhaps a slightly salted butter glaze on the exterior for that extra pelvic thrust.

Before I could exit I noticed the stage off in the corner indicating that this place gets active sometimes...and Daddy likes dat. Actually I wanted more of that. I wanted to know who the owner was and what they were into but expressed through more design cues around the shop. Things were very neutral. Anywhooos...I resisted the desire to hit the stage with my Persian Four Fingered Flute and made my exit. When in #Charlotte I'll be back to try more of Madison's Perk...perhaps with a soundtrack. Thanks for reading and I hope this review helps someone make the right cafe decision. Follow along on my journey across everywhere to review absolutely everything! There no review like a ReaL Review.

-ReaL

#cafe #coffee #music #foodie #breakfast #lattes
Love coming here for a coffee in the morning or cocktail in the late afternoon before heading over to The Auto Pour. Breakfast wrap is bomb. You can order ahead via their website!

Great place! I work from home and go here when my WiFi goes out. It's pretty quiet during the day. Kind of on the pricey side, but the drinks are definitely better than Starbucks or a typical coffee shop.

What a great space in terms of working remotely, meeting with friends, or just people watching within walking distance of a Madison Park residence. Food, coffee, and customer experience are all top notch. Website also is extensive and well maintained.
Visiting the area for a few weeks and luckily found Madison Perk my first morning! Incredible drip coffee. I would love to try their espresso drinks but I don't think I will be able to skip the drip!
This is a great spot! Had the cinnamon roll latte (half sweet) with oatmilk and it was delicious! Great little seating area and plenty of parking. Good place to study or get some work done.
My husband and I are literally at this coffee shop with our baby daily since he was just a few weeks old. Great coffee, people, and entertainment. Obsessed with this place!
some of the best coffee i've ever had, the girl who worked tonight was super sweet, fast, efficient, and helpful with suggestions.
Super cute and the barista was very nice and friendly. The breakfast burrito was delicious and the sweet potato being included in it was a fun surprise.
We had some time before being at CLT. I had a gingerbread Chai tea and others had hot chocolate and a coffee drink. You can bring your laptop and work or sit at a table or the comfy chairs.
Very nice service and I want to give it 10 stars

My fiancee has dragged me to 57 coffee shops (no exaggeration, it's documented) around the Charlotte area, and hands down, Madison Perk is the best one. I don't leave reviews, but something needs to be said about the quality of their coffee, as well as the personable staff; so personable you'll immediately feel like you're more than just a customer.

P.S. That loaded breakfast wrap though... holy shnikes...
Delicious coffee & everyone is so friendly. We also loved the play area with toys!
Their espresso is best. I recommend.

Great coffee. Awesome staff, so polite!
Vegan food available!!!

Love this spot! Such a gem in the neighborhood. Love that I can come for coffee and mimosas in the morning or stop by for an espresso martini in the evening. It is also a great place to have breakfast and coffee and sit and work for a few hours. They also are super friendly and helpful.
"Totally freakin awesome" are the words that came out of my mouth! Just had an incredible breakfast wrap and a Pumpkin SPIKED Latte (yep!). Skip Dunkin across the parking lot and enjoy yourself!
Wonderful!
We absolutely love this locally owned coffee bar.  My kiddos can get juice boxes and ice cream while we do coffee or adult beverages.  Plus live music and open mic nights!

Fantastic spot, amazingly friendly staff. Coffee is top notch, bacon egg cheese wrap was great and a huge portion. They also always make sure to bring my dog water outside, couldn't be happier this place is in the neighborhood now

Love this coffee shop! We live nearby and walk here with out little ones and dog on the weekends and they always give us water and a pup cup. The staff are super friendly and the coffee is very good. They have a pretty large menu for a smaller coffee shop and the breakfast wraps are yummy and very substantial! Great neighborhood spot!
Today marks my third visit to Madison Perk. Great work space, vibe, coffee and friendly service! Such a great addition to the area!
Great coffee and sandwiches, and the staff are so friendly.

We love this place! My husband and I live in the neighborhood, and have started a Saturday morning tradition of coffee at Madison Perk! The staff is always friendly and helpful, we love the environment.

I get a vanilla latte and the peanut butter wrap and they are both are fantastic! I would highly recommend this place! We will definitely visit later at night to try their coffee cocktails one of these days :)
Such a great, local coffee shop with so much more to offer! Great spot for a meeting or to come and work. Great grab and go food options -- cannot wait to try their cocktails!

Order a matcha latte, it was alright. The peanut butter wrap was not what I expected, it was too much filling. They do have a small stage and the music are nice. I brought their coffee beans, and I cannot wait to try that. I'm gonna order something different next time.
Really cute coffee place with a little of everything : coffee, beers, wine, and some snacks and sandwiches to munch on! They have live music on the weekends too....small and cozy!

I ordered a double espresso, I was charged for 2x "espressos" and received a quad shot, so I guess at the end of the day I got what I paid for, it's just not what i had asked for. No harm no foul, and other than that, the place seemed nice and clean and the barista was friendly.
Great place! Coffee is delicious and the breakfast wraps are too.

This place is amazing! Such great customer service and an amazing atmosphere. The guys that helped us were so friendly and great. I would strongly recommend stopping by this place. Would love to check this place out for the live music!
Madison Perk has quickly become my go-to coffee house in the area. Everyone there is so kind and energetic, and the vibe is perfect for morning "working away from home" getaways.
Great coffee, great people, and live music!

We love Madison Perk! The coffee selection is great and the wraps are delicious. The staff is always so welcoming and friendly. The live music makes the environment relaxing and fun. We appreciate that it is kid friendly with high chairs and a kids corner for them to play while we sit and drink our coffee. Highly recommend!
The iced mocha was really good and the wraps were delicious. Great to have a coffee shop in the neighborhood that we can walk to!
Great coffee, good wrap but my friend said the spinach and feta one was a little expensive for what you get.
Great environment with a very friendly staff. Great coffee and great food. I would definitely suggest for people to check this place out.
Good coffee and super fast.
First time going here and loved the vibe. Friendly staff and lots of comfortable seating

Y'all need to come here. Every interaction I've had with everyone behind the counter has been amazing, always kind and personable. It's a really great space (indoor and outdoor seating) with a lot of room to spread out and work. They also have live music on some days. The vibes are everything. HIGHLY recommend the chai, you can even order ahead online through their website.

Options are very limited, it's expensive for what you get, plus owner wasn't the nicest.

Burr n Berry is right down the road and is way better

I had a very good Espresso today!
Thank you Stacey!

The place is very comfortable to sit.
And is kid friendly, feels very local, not a chain...
Local musicians can play there as well!

Near to Office Depot...

Stopped in today for the first time. Best drip coffee I've had in Charlotte since I moved here from Asheville a few years ago.  The coffee had a fantastic flavor profile. Definitely recommend trying it out and support a local business!

I just went there for the first time today. I've been on the hunt for a good local coffee shop and I have found one I love! This place has a really great atmosphere and even better coffee. They have something on their menu for everyone. The staff is also very kind and friendly. Highly recommend!

This place should not be across the street from my shop because I will grab food and coffee from here everyday if I could  the spring fling is amazing & the the bacon, egg, and cheese wrap hits the spot!

So happy to have a new local coffee shop! My wife and I dropped in and had a delicious espresso and cappuccino. She got the blueberry chevre scone and I got the bacon egg and cheese wrap. Very impressed by both. We'll be back!

Needed to find somewhere to hang around while my car was getting a hitch installed at the uhaul across the street. Very hip and cozy joint. Assortment of pastries, and different milk options. I love the nice outdoor seating while I read and enjoyed my oat milk latte.
Great coffee, food and atmosphere! Highly recommend. The staff were friendly and welcoming
Highly recommend. A warm and inviting atmosphere with fresh coffee. A welcome autumn to the Madison Park neighborhood!
Amazing spot!

We love Madison Perk! They have a great selection of coffee and food. They have live music and also have a kids area where kids can play while parents enjoy coffee. Their coffee is delicious and the staff is so friendly! Our new fav spot!

Glen and I were there for the first time yesterday. They have wonderful coffee and a great vibe. Patrick was extremely sweet along with everyone else working there at the time. They also having plenty of seating and a stage for regular music events. We will definitely be back!
I had a Carmel latte it was very good.
This place is a local gem!! The coffee is great and the environment is so inviting! I love working from there! Highly recommend it!! They also have live music occasionally which is so fun!!
Highly recommend. A warm and inviting atmosphere with fresh coffee. Just what our Madison Park neighborhood needed! This is our new go to coffee shop.
Delicious coffee, great wraps and live music!! So happy to have Madison Perk in the neighborhood!
